content:
I was working on #24677 which allows to schedule data deletion date while deactivating an organization.
As mentioned in issue description there will be a server-level setting for maximum/minimum allowed duration. So, when a user is mentioning a custom date we need to communicate the maximum and minimum allowed duration period.

I think the following screenshot looks good but would appreciate any suggestions.
Screenshot-from-2023-06-16-21-48-19.png
Are you looking for feedback on the UI copy (the text)?
Yes, on the text styling. Also, if there is any better position where the text can be placed.

Is the part with the selector for the number of days revealed after choosing Custom from the topmost drop-down?

Purely for my own part, I tend to favor keeping a tight lefthand edge on things--rather than indenting.

Yeah, for option other than custom we will have following UI.
Screenshot-from-2023-06-16-23-28-37.png
Regarding indentation we follow this pattern at other places too where we want to take custom time as input. So I kept the same indentation to be consistent.
Sure :) as long as you're modeling it deliberately, that's great!
I also need some suggestions for the default value of server-level setting for maximum/minimum allowed duration.

@Ujjawal Modi I think defaults of minimum 14 days, no maximum might be fine for self-hosted organizations and would be a good default. We haven't discussed the specific policies for Zulip Cloud but 28 days and/ 2 years is a pair of values I could imagine if you want something concrete to test.

(From a policy standpoint, one probably doesn't want to offer something too short to limit to ability of someone who breaks into an admin account to do permanent damage, and probably the maximum wants to not be infinity so that one can garbage-collect things)
Do we also want default minimum/maximum values to be given in terms of no. of minutes or only in terms of no. of days?
@Ujjawal Modi I think days is a good unit for this sort of thing; I don't see a reason to set this to a number that's not an nonnegative integer number of days.
